skill levels.none: I have no experience or knowledge of this skill.
skill levels.novice: I have a basic understanding of this skill and can perform simple tasks with guidance.
skill levels.adept: I have a good understanding of this skill and can perform tasks independently.
skill levels.expert: I have an advanced understanding of this skill and can perform complex tasks and mentor others.
skill levels.master: I have a comprehensive and authoritative understanding of this skill and am recognized as an expert in the field.
